mapper.select: select comp.title,Totalnum,concat(case when Totalnum>0 then cast(DealSuccNum*100.0/Totalnum as decimal(18,2)) else 0.00 end,'%') asbjl ,Totalnum-DealSuccNum as notdealnum,case when DealSuccNum>0 then cast(DealDate*1.0/DealSuccNum as signed) else 0 end bjts from ( select com.title,com.id,sum(case when taskunit.status=4 then 1 else 0 end) as DealSuccNum,sum(case when taskunit.id is not null then 1 else 0 end)Totalnum ,sum(case when taskunit.status=4 then cast(timestampdiff(SECOND,taskunit.createtime,taskunit.endtime)/86400 as signed) else 0 end)as DealDate from t_tb_company com left join td_taskassign_unit taskunit on taskunit.unitid=com.id and taskunit.createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by com.id,com.title ) comp

select user.name,ifnull(taskCrenum,0) taskCrenum,ifnull(unitnum,0) unitnum ,ifnull(dealnum,0) dealnum, ifnull(meetnum,0) meetnum,ifnull(assignnum,0) assignnum,ifnull(infonum,0) infonum from sys_user user left join (select creatorid,count(1)as taskCrenum from td_taskassign where createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )CreT on CreT.creatorid=`user`.id left join (select personid,count(1) as unitnum from td_taskassign_unit where createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by personid ) UnitT on UnitT.personid=`user`.id left join (select personid,count(1) as dealnum from (select personid from td_taskassign_unit units where units.createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by personid,tassignid)a group by personid )DealT on DealT.personid=`user`.id left join (select creatorid,count(1) as meetnum from td_meeting where mtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )meeT on meeT.creatorid=`user`.id left join (select creatorid,count(1) as assignnum from td_docassign where createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )DocT on DocT.creatorid=`user`.id left join (select creatorid,count(1) as infonum from td_infos where mtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )infoT on infoT.creatorid=`user`.id

select titlename,max(case when name=1 then num else 0 end ) as 'one',max(case when name=2 then num else 0 end ) as 'two' ,max(case when name=3 then num else 0 end ) as 'three',max(case when name=4 then num else 0 end ) as 'four',max(case when name=5 then num else 0 end ) as 'five' ,max(case when name=6 then num else 0 end ) as 'six',max(case when name=7 then num else 0 end ) as 'seven',max(case when name=8 then num else 0 end ) as 'eight' ,max(case when name=9 then num else 0 end ) as 'nine',max(case when name=10 then num else 0 end ) as 'ten',max(case when name=11 then num else 0 end ) as 'eleven' ,max(case when name=12 then num else 0 end ) as 'twelve' from ( select '督办事项'as titlename,td.name,sum(if(tak.id is null,0,1)) as num,1 as colsort from t_td_date td left join td_taskassign tak on td.name=month(tak.createtime) and year(tak.createtime)=year(#{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) group by td.name union all
select '区委会议'as titlename,td.name,sum(if(meet.id is null,0,1)) as num,2 as colsort from t_td_date td left join td_meeting meet on td.name=month(meet.mtime) and year(meet.mtime)=year(#{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) group by td.name union all
select '区委公文'as titlename,td.name,sum(if(doc.id is null,0,1)) as num,3 as colsort from t_td_date td left join td_docassign doc on td.name=month(doc.createtime) and year(doc.createtime)=year(#{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) group by td.name union all
select '区委信息'as titlename,td.name,sum(if(info.id is null,0,1)) as num,4 as colsort from t_td_date td left join td_infos info on td.name=month(info.mtime) and year(info.mtime)=year(#{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) group by td.name ) a group by titlename order by colsort

select GROUP_CONCAT(name)as name,GROUP_CONCAT(unitnum)as unitnum,GROUP_CONCAT(dealnum)as dealnum,GROUP_CONCAT(taskCrenum)as taskCrenum ,GROUP_CONCAT(meetnum)as meetnum,GROUP_CONCAT(assignnum)as assignnum,GROUP_CONCAT(infonum)as infonum from ( select user.name,ifnull(taskCrenum,0) taskCrenum,ifnull(unitnum,0) unitnum ,ifnull(dealnum,0) dealnum, ifnull(meetnum,0) meetnum,ifnull(assignnum,0) assignnum,ifnull(infonum,0) infonum from sys_user user left join (select creatorid,count(1)as taskCrenum from td_taskassign where createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )CreT on CreT.creatorid=`user`.id left join (select personid,count(1) as unitnum from td_taskassign_unit where createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by personid ) UnitT on UnitT.personid=`user`.id left join (select personid,count(1) as dealnum from (select personid from td_taskassign_unit units where units.createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by personid,tassignid)a group by personid )DealT on DealT.personid=`user`.id left join (select creatorid,count(1) as meetnum from td_meeting where mtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )meeT on meeT.creatorid=`user`.id left join (select creatorid,count(1) as assignnum from td_docassign where createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )DocT on DocT.creatorid=`user`.id left join (select creatorid,count(1) as infonum from td_infos where mtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by creatorid )infoT on infoT.creatorid=`user`.id )a

select '区委会议'as titlename,td.name,sum(if(meet.id is null,0,1)) as num,2 as colsort from t_td_date td left join td_meeting meet on td.name=month(meet.mtime) and year(meet.mtime)=year(#{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) group by td.name union all
select '区委公文'as titlename,td.name,sum(if(doc.id is null,0,1)) as num,3 as colsort from t_td_date td left join td_docassign doc on td.name=month(doc.createtime) and year(doc.createtime)=year(#{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) group by td.name union all
select '区委信息'as titlename,td.name,sum(if(info.id is null,0,1)) as num,4 as colsort from t_td_date td left join td_infos info on td.name=month(info.mtime) and year(info.mtime)=year(#{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) group by td.name )b group by titlename,colsort order by colsort

select itemdesc,GROUP_CONCAT(title order by comid) as grouptitle,GROUP_CONCAT(num order by comid)as groupvalue from ( select Tab.itemdesc,Tab.title,sum(if(meeting.id is null,0,meeting.checkvalue)) as num,comid from (select item.id,item.itemdesc,com.title,com.id as comid from td_checkitem item,t_tb_company com where item.itemclass=2)Tab left join td_meetingrec meeting on meeting.checkitemid=Tab.id and Tab.comid=meeting.unitid and meeting.createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by Tab.itemdesc,Tab.title,comid )a group by itemdesc

select itemdesc,GROUP_CONCAT(title order by comid) grouptitle,GROUP_CONCAT(num order by comid) as groupvalue from ( select Tab.itemdesc,Tab.title,sum(if(doc.id is null,0,doc.checkvalue)) as num,comid from (select item.id,item.itemdesc,com.title,com.id as comid from td_checkitem item,t_tb_company com where item.itemclass=3)Tab left join td_docassignrec doc on doc.checkitemid=Tab.id and Tab.comid=doc.unitid and doc.createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by Tab.itemdesc,Tab.title,comid )a group by itemdesc

select itemdesc,GROUP_CONCAT(title order by comid) grouptitle,GROUP_CONCAT(num order by comid) as groupvalue from ( select Tab.itemdesc,Tab.title,sum(if(info.id is null,0,info.checkvalue)) as num,comid from (select item.id,item.itemdesc,com.title,com.id as comid from td_checkitem item,t_tb_company com where item.itemclass=4)Tab left join td_infosrec info on info.checkitemid=Tab.id and Tab.comid=info.unitid and info.createtime between #{beforeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by Tab.itemdesc,Tab.title,comid )a group by itemdesc
